name: FAQ Schema for Featured Snippets
approach: Implement FAQPage schema using JSON-LD to enable FAQ rich results in search. Structure content with clear questions and concise answers. Each Q&A pair should be self-contained and directly answer the question. Limit to 5-10 questions per page for best results.
rationale: FAQPage schema can trigger rich results that display expandable Q&A pairs directly in search results, significantly increasing SERP real estate and click-through rates. FAQ rich results are especially valuable for informational queries and can appear alongside other rich results.

code_examples.markdown_with_schema:
---
title: "Frequently Asked Questions"
description: "Find answers to common questions about our product."
schema:
  type: FAQPage
---

# Frequently Asked Questions

## What is your return policy?

We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all purchases. If you're not satisfied, contact our support team for a full refund.

## How long does shipping take?

Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping (2-3 days) is available for an additional fee.

## Do you ship internationally?

Yes, we ship to over 50 countries. International shipping typically takes 10-14 business days.

success_indicators: FAQPage schema validates in Google Rich Results Test
Each Question has a corresponding Answer
Answers directly address the question (no filler content)
Answer text is between 50-300 words for optimal display
Questions use natural language (how people actually search)
HTML in answers is properly escaped/formatted
